params.newLayerZeroEndpoint: the LayerZero Endpoint address that was updated

params.newRateProvider: the RateProvider address that was updated

params.newSrcChainId: the source chainId that was updated

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updateLayerZeroEndpoint(address).details: Can only be called by owner

params._layerZeroEndpoint: the new layer zero endpoint address

updateRateProvider(address).details: Can only be called by owner

updateSrcChainId(uint16).details: Can only be called by owner

LayerZeroEndpointUpdated(address).notice: Emitted when LayerZero Endpoint is updated

SrcChainIdUpdated(uint16).notice: Emitted when the source chainId is updated

getRate().notice: Gets the last stored rate in the contract

lzReceive(uint16,bytes,uint64,bytes).notice: LayerZero receive function which is called via send from a different chain

rate().notice: Last rate updated on the receiver

userdoc.notice: Receives a rate from a provider contract on a different chain than the one this contract is deployed on
